title: Derek Gee on Track for Tour de France Debut, Froome, Fuglsang, Others on Bubble at Israel-Premier Tech
content:
Like many teams, Israel-Premier Tech will decide its 'Tour 8' after the Tour de Suisse: 'We want to have an objective every single day at the Tour de France.'

Read the full article at Derek Gee on Track for Tour de France Debut, Froome, Fuglsang, Others on Bubble at Israel-Premier Tech on Velo.
author: ahood
